mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.venue_id AS "reserveVenue.id", a.visitors_set_id AS "visitorsSet.id", p.name AS "visitorsSet.name", a.member_id AS "member.id", a.cons_mobile AS "consMobile", a.user_name AS "userName", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.collect_price AS "collectPrice", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.collect_count AS "collectCount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN reserve_venue_visitors_set p ON a.visitors_set_id = p.id
mapper.select:
SELECT sum(a.collect_price) as orderPrice,c.name as projectName, count(pay_Type) as total, sum(case pay_Type when '1' then a.collect_price else 0 end) memberPrice, sum(case pay_Type when '2' then a.collect_price else 0 end) moneyPrice, sum(case pay_Type when '3' then a.collect_price else 0 end) cardPrice, sum(case pay_Type when '4' then a.collect_price else 0 end) weixinPrice, sum(case pay_Type when '5' then a.collect_price else 0 end) zfbPrice, sum(case pay_Type when '6' then a.collect_price else 0 end) otherPrice FROM reserve_venue_order a,reserve_venue_visitors_set b,reserve_project c where a.del_flag = '0' and a.visitors_set_id = b.id and b.project_id = c.id and a.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
and date(a.update_date)=date(CURDATE())
and month(a.update_date)=month(CURDATE())
and year(a.update_date)=year(CURDATE())
and (a.update_date BETWEEN #{sqlMap.startDate} AND #{sqlMap.endDate})
${sqlMap.dsf} group by c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve_venue_order( id, venue_id, visitors_set_id, member_id, cons_mobile, user_name, order_type, order_date, order_price, collect_price, pay_type, collect_count, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, tenant_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{reserveVenue.id}, #{visitorsSet.id}, #{member.id}, #{consMobile}, #{userName}, #{orderType}, #{orderDate}, #{orderPrice}, #{collectPrice}, #{payType}, #{collectCount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{tenantId} )
